name: ERC721 META NFT
abi: function _baseURI() internal view virtual override returns (string memory)
function mint(address _to, uint256 _mintAmount, uint256 id) public payable
function walletOfOwner(address _owner) public view returns (uint256[] memory)
function tokenURI(uint256 tokenId) public view virtual override returns (string memory)
description: ERC721 smartcontract developed by Ajayi Chibueze Adeyemi for the Meta project
